results.content:
One of the best frontend courses on Udemy. I've struggled wrapping my head around Redux and this course is finally helping me get it, with a delivery style that's warm, engaging, and incredibly well-explained. 

In this course, the instructor goes through each concept step-by-step, building up on a foundation of fundamentals, making sure each concept is covered thoroughly before he moves on. Not only that, but the curriculum covers modern redux with hooks, making sure you'll have the latest and greatest tools and techniques under your belt when you go out to put these concepts into practice.

Rarely do I take a course and enjoy it simply for how well organized and easy to follow it is. In just 3.5 hours of coursework, you'll walk away with a deep understanding of Redux that will allow you to tackle the technology with confidence and ease.

response.content:
Wow Thanks Christian for the feedback :) Much appreciated :)
Regards, RapidDevPro
